entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
